column1: The opossum is also commonly known as possum
column2: It is a small rat likeanimal found mainly in south and north america
column3: It is used in different biomediale case studies as a laboratory animal
column4: Also contributing in psychological research with the exposure to embryological development suitable for development studies and a characteristics marsupial brain suitable for "slip-brain" studies of relationships between the two cerebral hemispheres and comparative learning
